headline: iXAfrica Data Centres Collaborates with Oracle to Deliver Kenya’s First Public Cloud Region
summary: NAIROBI, Kenya, January 27, 2026--iXAfrica Data Centre Limited (iXAfrica) (https://iXAfrica.co.ke), East and Central Africa’s largest hyperscale, carrier-neutral, AI-ready facility, will collaborate with Oracle as the host partner for the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) (http://apo-opa.co/4rlwfdb) region in Nairobi, Kenya. Announced by H.E. President William Ruto in January 2024, this new public cloud region will help meet strong demand for OCI services in Kenya.

headline: Orbit Analytics Announces Partnership with Databricks to Empower Enterprises with Modern, Unified Data Intelligence
summary: Orbit Analytics, a leading provider of AI-powered enterprise reporting and analytics solutions for Oracle applications, today announced a partnership with Databricks, the Data and AI company, to deliver faster, smarter, and more unified data intelligence to enterprise customers.

headline: Latest News In Cloud AI - EU AI GRID Advances Europe's Digital Sovereignty Initiative
summary: The EU AI GRID has been launched in Vilnius, marking a significant advancement in AI infrastructure within Europe. This initiative, spearheaded by Telecentras and Singapore-based Embedded LLM, aims to provide a network that complies with GDPR data and the EU AI Act, ensuring digital sovereignty and protection of sensitive information. The project is designed to empower AI users in Europe with transparency and robust data protection, thereby enhancing productivity and security. The EU AI GRID...

headline: U.S. AI-Related Stocks Gain Premarket, Following Bullish Asia Session
summary: Futures for U.S. AI-related stocks were rising after tech stocks gained in Asia trade and Micron Technology said after the close it will invest around $24 billion in Singapore over the next decade on surging in demand for memory chips.

headline: TikTok blames data center outages for U.S. app problems, denies censorship claims
